gate.jape.plus

Class Transducer.SinglePhaseTransducerPDA

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.jape.Transducer
      • gate.jape.SinglePhaseTransducer
        • gate.jape.plus.Transducer.SinglePhaseTransducerPDA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.jape.JapeConstants, gate.util.Benchmarkable, Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    Transducer

    protected static class Transducer.SinglePhaseTransducerPDA
extends gate.jape.SinglePhaseTransducer
    Modified version of SPT that produces a different type of FSM data. This is used during the parsing of JAPE code.
